rooms.description: Spacious living area with high ceilings and minimalistic interior; includes built-in seating areas.
Modern open-concept kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances, designed for luxury usage, following Vastu by aligning east-facing entrance.
Integrated dining area adjacent to the living room; features natural light from skylight and a private balcony extension.
Primary bedroom with ample storage and an ensuite bathroom; positioned in the north-east corner per Vastu to ensure prosperity.
Ensuite bathroom for the main bedroom; includes luxury fixtures.
Fully equipped gym space with mirrored walls and ample clearance, located in a quiet corner of the studio apartment.

openings.description: Main entrance designed with reinforced Brutalist materials and security features.
Garage entry integrated into the design for easy access, following building codes.
